participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and passionate about his job, enjoys adrenaline-filled activities.
participant_1.background: i've been working since i was sixteen years old. i'm a construction worker. my favorite food is mexican food. my favorite band is aerosmith. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Fashion-forward and ambitious, she values her independence and has a keen eye for style.
participant_2.background: i like shopping. i currently work for a watch dealer. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. my family does not support my career choices.

content.text: i work for a construction company and i have been there since i was sixteen
